/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors that add vibrancy to the urban landscape. Cars and buses can be seen moving along the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the scene and enhancing the overall mood of the image.
